summary: Test module for the Kandinsky V2.2 prior generation pipeline, containing utilities to create mock model components and a suite of fast unit tests that verify core functionalities such as attention slicing, callback execution, batch processing, and prior image generation.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness of the Kandinsky V2.2 prior pipeline within the Diffusers library, enabling reliable development, continuous integration, and maintenance of the image generation workflow.
